pageContext.claim: “There is a lot of talk about the fact that she [Rep. Ilhan Omar] was married to her brother. I know nothing about it. I hear she was married to her brother. You're asking me a question about it. I don't know but I'm sure that somebody will be able to look into that.”
pageContext.analysis: This very serious charge about Rep. Ilhan Omar (D-Minn.) has not been proven. It appears to have originated with a Trump supporter posting on a message board called Somali Spot, as the Daily Beast reported.
